name: handled-customer-agent
description: Unified Customer Agent for HANDLED - consolidates booking-agent and project-hub-agent (customer view)

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx adk deploy cloud_run --project=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT:-handled-484216} --region=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION:-us-central1} --service_name=customer-agent
scripts.deploy:dry-run: npm run build && npx adk deploy cloud_run --project=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT:-handled-484216} --region=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION:-us-central1} --service_name=customer-agent --dry-run
